# NumericImputer.Strategy.mean

**Case**

Imputation strategy that replaces missing elements with the mean.

## Declaration

```swift
case mean
```

## Imputer strategies

- **NumericImputer.Strategy.constant(_:)**: Imputation strategy that replaces missing elements with a constant.
- **NumericImputer.Strategy.median**: Imputation strategy that replaces missing elements with the median.

items.description: Imputation strategy that replaces missing elements with a constant.

items.description: Imputation strategy that replaces missing elements with the median.
